name: UITextSmartInsertDeleteType
desc: Constants that specify whether to automatically insert extra spaces after a paste operation or to delete them after a cut or delete operation.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Use the default behavior for inserting and deleting space characters.

items.name: case no
items.desc: Disable the insertion or deletion of extra spaces.

items.name: case yes
items.desc: Enable the insertion or deletion of extra spaces.
